{{Community}}
The following tables display the [[Elemental Gauge Theory|gauge unit]] application of character abilities.

For {{Cryo}}, {{Dendro}}, {{Electro}}, {{Hydro}}, {{Pyro}} which can apply auras:

* '''1U:''' Applies 1U; When applying an aura, creates a 0.8U aura which decays in 9.5 seconds
* '''1.5U:''' Applies 1.5U; When applying an aura, creates a 1.2U aura which decays in 10.75 seconds
* '''2U:''' Applies 2U; When applying an aura, creates a 1.6U aura which decays in 12 seconds
* '''4U:''' Applies 4U; When applying an aura, creates a 3.2U aura which decays in 17 seconds

Note that when under the effects of [[Elemental Infusion]]s, all [[Sword]], [[Claymore]], and [[Polearm]] characters' [[Normal Attack]], [[Charged Attack]] and [[Plunging Attack]] landing apply '''1U''' of the infused element, and mid-air collision while plunging applies '''0U'''.
